sentences.english: Because put ho, eat up and soft and sweet, flavour is delicious.
sentences.chinese: 因爲放了蠔，喫起來又軟又香，味道鮮美。

sentences.english: Oyster is the most famous specialties of Shenzhen, especially Shajin Oyster.
sentences.chinese: 蠔是深圳最著名的特產，以沙井蠔最爲著名。

sentences.english: Kumamoto oyster, Fine Claire oyster, chu-toro, tuna & salmon sashimi.
sentences.chinese: 日本熊本生蠔，法國芬得克雷爾生蠔，金槍魚腩。

sentences.english: Kumamoto oyster, Fine Claire oyster, chu-toro, tuna & salmon sashimi.
sentences.chinese: 日本熊本生蠔，法國芬得克雷爾生蠔，金槍魚腩。

sentences.english: I have fish, oysters and clams. Could you help me clean them?
sentences.chinese: 我有魚，蠔和蚌，能否請你幫我洗呢？

sentences.english: Oysters are the fresh nature taste of the sea.
sentences.chinese: 生蠔俗稱“海上牛奶”，是來自海洋的自然產物。

sentences.english: It is an ideal accompaniment with fresh oysters and seafood.
sentences.chinese: 適合配以生蠔和海鮮飲用。

sentences.english: Sales of oysters remained the same but oyster-related deaths dropped to zero.
sentences.chinese: 生蠔的銷量和平時一樣但生蠔相關死亡降至零。

sentences.english: Sales of oysters remained the same but oyster-related deaths dropped to zero.
sentences.chinese: 生蠔的銷量和平時一樣但生蠔相關死亡降至零。

sentences.english: Oysters, in addition to fresh outside, still can make the oyster sauce, etc, is public like food.
sentences.chinese: 蠔，除鮮食外，還可製成蠔油等，是大衆喜歡食品。

sentences.english: Jazz music comes from the house, and large amounts of oysters and champagne are served.
sentences.chinese: 豪宅中傳出爵士音樂，還供應大量的生蠔和香檳。

sentences.english: Oysters on half shell and garlic toast.
I had raw oysters for the first time last night.
sentences.chinese: 我昨晚生平第一次喫生蠔。

sentences.english: Cook the sauce in the remaining oil until thickened. Return oysters to the wok and toss well.
sentences.chinese: 用剩餘油把芡汁煮滾至濃稠，把蠔只回鑊，拌勻。

sentences.english: Raw oysters, High acid foods , Goat's cheese.
sentences.chinese: 生蠔，高酸食物，山羊奶酪。

sentences.english: I'm happy to say we are going to get some more oysters .
sentences.chinese: 我很高興告訴你們，我們還需要進口多些生蠔。

definition: (Tw) bowl of boiled rice with other food on top (loanword from Japanese "donburi")
giant clam/geoduck (Panopea abrupta)/elephant trunk clam/same as 象拔蚌[xiang4 ba2 bang4]
